title: Efficient Online Unlearning via Hessian-Free Recollection of Individual Data Statistics
abstract: arXiv:2404.01712v1 Announce Type: cross  Abstract: Machine unlearning strives to uphold the data owners' right to be forgotten by enabling models to selectively forget specific data. Recent methods suggest that one approach of data forgetting is by precomputing and storing statistics carrying second-order information to improve computational and memory efficiency. However, they rely on restrictive assumptions and the computation/storage suffer from the curse of model parameter dimensionality, making it challenging to apply to most deep neural networks. In this work, we propose a Hessian-free online unlearning method. We propose to maintain a statistical vector for each data point, computed through affine stochastic recursion approximation of the difference between retrained and learned models. translated_title: 通过免Hessian重新整合个体数据统计实现高效在线遗忘
translated_abstract: 机器遗忘旨在通过使模型能够选择性地忘记特定数据来维护数据所有者的被遗忘权利。最近的方法表明，一种数据遗忘的方法是通过预先计算和存储携带二阶信息的统计数据，以改进计算和内存效率。然而，它们依赖于苛刻的假设，而且计算/存储受到模型参数维度的诅咒，这使得难以应用到大多数深度神经网络中。在本工作中，我们提出了一种免Hessian在线遗忘方法。我们建议为每个数据点维护一个统计向量，通过重新训练和学习模型之间的差异的仿射随机递归逼近来计算。我们提出的算法实现了近乎瞬时的在线遗忘，因为它只需要进行矢量加法操作。基于重新收集遗忘数据统计的策略，
tldr: 通过提出的Hessian-free在线遗忘方法，实现了近乎瞬时的在线遗忘，仅需要进行矢量加法操作。
en_tdlr: Near-instantaneous online unlearning is achieved through the proposed Hessian-free method, requiring only a vector addition operation.
